title: Hello!
text:
Welcome to my webpage! ^_^
I’m Yee Ching, a Communications and New Media student at the National University of Singapore!

As someone who loves to express myself in creative ways, be it in written or visual forms, I’m keen to explore a career in the communications and marketing industry.
Beyond my career aspirations, in my free time, you’ll probably catch me doodling away on my iPad, playing with my terrapin, watching shows, or napping away…zzz.



 Back to top

title: Project Diary
text:
As an avid K-Drama watcher, I felt compelled to explore the topic of Korean Dramas, also known as K-Dramas, and answer the question of, What makes K-Drama popular?.
Through a factors-type data-story, I will explain the popularity of K-Dramas by analysing and showcasing the specific factors that have contributed to its popularity.





K-Drama’s degree of popularity worldwide as of December 2022: https://www.statista.com/statistics/999239/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-worldwide/

1.1 America 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017862/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-us/
1.2 Japan 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017819/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-japan/
1.3 Thailand 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017828/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-thailand/
1.4 China 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017829/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-china/
1.5 Russia 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017888/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-russia/

Top 100 K-Dramas users have ranked on MyDramaList, featuring variables like Name, Year of Release, Aired Date, Aired On, Number of Episode, Network, Duration, Content Rating, Synopsis, Cast, Genre, Tags, Rank, Rating: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/top-100-korean-drama-mydramalist
Information about dramas (Drama Name, Year, Synopsis, Genres, Tags, Director, Screen writer, Country ect) and user reviews (Ratings on the story, Acting cast, Music, Rewatch Value, Overall, Number of episodes watched etc) from Korea, Japan, and Thailand: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/thai-and-japanese-drama-vs-korean-drama-dominance?select=kor_user_reviews.csv
Top 5000 Asian Dramas from Korea, Japan, China, Taiwan, and Thailand, featuring variables like Name, Episodes, Released Year, Language, Rating, Ranking: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/lakshmiindukosuri/top-5000-dramas-1983-2023
Popular over the top media services for accessing K-Dramas worldwide in 2022: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/999315/south-korea-ott-services-for-accessing-korean-dramas-worldwide/

title: Project Diary
text:
1. Finalised Topic
As an avid K-Drama watcher, I felt compelled to explore the topic of Korean Dramas, also known as K-Dramas, and answer the question of, What makes K-Drama popular?.
Through a factors-type data-story, I will explain the popularity of K-Dramas by analysing and showcasing the specific factors that have contributed to its popularity.

title: Project Diary
text:
